description: You feel accomplished, but nothing remarkable happens.
You feel it is imperative to press the advantage no matter the cost.
effect: You can choose to gain advantage on all attacks against your target until the end of your next turn, but if you do all enemies have advantage on their attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn.

description: You feel it is imperative to press the advantage, but maintain awareness of your surroundings.
effect: You can choose to gain advantage on all attacks against your target next turn, your target has advantage on their attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn.

description: You know how to press the advantage.
effect: You gain advantage on all attacks against your target until the end of your next turn.

description: As you are fighting, you notice an effective route to escape danger.
effect: You are able to use either the disengage or dash action as part of your next attack action.

description: You feel the eb and flow of the battle, and know where to make your next move.
effect: After your turn you move to the top of the initiative order.

description: You begin to recognize patterns in your opponent's fighting technique.
effect: You gain +2 to your AC against your target, and advantage on all savings throws from effects originating from your target until your next turn.

description: You are able to maneuver towards your opponent while attacking, and attempt to harass them.
effect: After your attack you can choose to move toward your target as part of the same action and if you end your turn within 30 feet of them, they must make any attacks at disadvantage until the start of your next turn.

description: You are able to maneuver towards your opponent while attacking and harass them.
effect: Your target is so focused on you that they neglect their surroundings and any attacks are made at disadvantage until the start of your next turn.

description: You attempt to disarm your opponent.
effect: You may make an opposed Dexterity check against your opponent, and if they fail they are disarmed by your shot.

description: You knock your target's weapon out of their hands.
effect: Your target must make a Dexterity saving throw at a DC of 10 plus your attack modifier or their weapon is knocked 20 feet away.

description: Your senses heighten and you become aware of threats around the battlefield.
effect: You are able to take the dodge action as part of your attack action.

description: Your attack knocks your target to the ground.

effect: Your target is stunned until the end of their next turn.
Roll an additional set of damage dice above and beyond your normal critical roll.
Roll an additional set of damage dice above and beyond your normal critical roll, and the target suffers one unit of exhaustion.

Roll an additional set of damage dice above and beyond your normal critical roll, and the target suffers a permanent injury chosen by the DM. The permanent injury can be healed with extended rest of a length determined by the DM, but the attack leaves a scar.

Roll an additional set of damage dice above and beyond your normal critical roll, the target suffers 1 unit of exhaustion, and the target suffers a permanent injury chosen by the DM. The permanent injury can be healed with extended rest of a length determined by the DM, but the attack leaves a scar.
